thread.title: Ulta Early Black Friday Sale Offers Up to 50% Off on Beauty Essentials
thread.title_full: Ulta Early Black Friday Sale Offers Up to 50% Off on Beauty Essentials

author: ZoomBangla
title: Ulta Early Black Friday Sale Offers Up to 50% Off on Beauty Essentials
text:
Ulta Beauty has launched its Black Friday deals early this year. The sale began on October 26 and runs through November 22. This gives shoppers a full month to access major discounts.
According to The Hollywood Reporter, the event features deep price cuts on seasonal staples. The promotion includes holiday gift sets and daily beauty essentials.
Week-Long Deals on Makeup, Skincare, and Fragrance
The Ulta Early Black Friday Sale provides up to 50 percent off hundreds of full-sized items. Travel-size best-sellers are discounted up to 55 percent. The sale covers every major beauty category.
New categories are highlighted each week for additional savings. This structure encourages shoppers to check back regularly. The strategy spreads out the shopping frenzy over several weeks.
Top Product Picks from the Promotion
Standout deals include brands like Tula and Estée Lauder. The Tula ‘Spresso Energizing Eye Balm is a popular choice. It is described as an espresso shot for tired eyes.
The sale also includes high-value sets from Sigma Beauty. Their 12-piece brush set is a professional-grade collection. Tools from T3, like the AireBrush, are also significantly discounted.
Shoppers can find advent calendars and holiday collections. The Ulta Beauty x Mini Brands Advent Calendar contains detailed replicas. It is a collectible item for beauty enthusiasts.
The Ulta Early Black Friday Sale provides an extended window for budget-conscious shoppers. Significant savings are available on a wide range of products. This early event helps consumers avoid the holiday rush.
Thought you’d like to know
When does the Ulta Early Black Friday Sale end?
The sale event runs from October 26 through November 22. This provides a nearly month-long shopping period. New weekly deals are introduced throughout the promotion.
What is the maximum discount available?
Shoppers can save up to 50% on full-sized favorites. Travel-size items are discounted up to 55%. The savings apply across makeup, skincare, and hair tools.
Which brands are included in the sale?
Major brands like Tarte, Peter Thomas Roth, and Lancôme are featured. The sale includes hundreds of products from various categories. High-end and drugstore brands are both part of the promotion.
Are holiday gift sets included?
Yes, the sale features seasonal staples and holiday gifts. This includes advent calendars and limited-edition collections. It is an ideal opportunity for early holiday shopping.
Does Ulta offer price matching during this event?
Ulta’s price matching policy details are available on their website. It is best to check their current policy directly. Their official policy outlines any specific exclusions for major sales.
Trusted Sources
The Hollywood Reporter
